item.title: About
item.description: Kaizen Practitioner SAFe Agilist and hands-on technologist Passionate about building Scalable Platforms & High Performing Teams DevOps Evangelist experienced in building cross-functional agile teams with a focus on digital and organizational transformation, DevOps Implementation, Cloud Automation & Engineering, Platform Engineering & Support. Results-driven technology leader with a proven track record to deliver robust architecture and solutions to achieve complex, globally-facing business needs in the cloud and on-premise environments.
